definition: to shed tears/to weep
tears/nasal mucus

zero/nought/zero sign/fractional/fragmentary/odd (of numbers)/(placed between two numbers to indicate a smaller quantity followed by a larger one)/fraction/(in mathematics) remainder (after division)/extra/to wither and fall/to wither
to shed tears of gratitude (idiom); moved to tears

sentences.english: Carlo leaned back, his face flushed with gratification.
sentences.chinese: 卡罗靠在椅背上，感激涕零，满面红光。

sentences.english: When leaders treat the member well occasionally, they accept any and all crumbs gratefully.
sentences.chinese: 当领导者偶尔略施小惠，他们便感激涕零。

sentences.english: And you should be thankful that me and Ryan can lift your music out of its obscurity.
sentences.chinese: 我和雷恩能让你的作品得以见天日你该感激涕零才是。

sentences.english: "Thank you, " the grateful child told the stranger.
sentences.chinese: “谢谢你，”孩子感激涕零地对这位陌生人说道。

sentences.english: You think they're gonna give a crap if I know their names?
sentences.chinese: 我知道他们的名字他们就会感激涕零了？

sentences.english: Here and now I alone shed tears.
My heart, is always sweet juice and tears alternately, shed tears of gratitude.
sentences.chinese: 我的心啊，常常是甜汁与泪水交替，感激涕零。

definition: to shed tears of gratitude (idiom); moved to tears
can't thank sb enough (idiom)
to weep/to shed tears
tears and mucus flowing profusely/sniveling/in a tragic state
tears and mucus flowing profusely (idiom); weeping tragically
to admire with gratitude
to recall fondly/to remember with emotion
to feel gratitude mixed with shame
hard to forget even after one's teeth fall out (idiom); to remember a benefactor as long as one lives/undying gratitude
to shed silent tears (idiom)
unable to return the favor
hot tears
deeply grateful
unable to control one's grief (idiom); overwrought/overcome with sorrow/heartbroken
sincerely grateful
lit. will not be forgotten even after one's teeth fall out/to remember as long as one lives/unforgettable (idiom)
